bill.title: As enacted, revises various election law procedures concerning registration notification forms, times for appointment of election officials, inclusion of voter's date of birth on application to vote absentee, and establishing a mechanism for non-resident property owners to vote absentee by mail. - Amends TCA Section 2-12-111(a); Section 2-2-107(a); Section 2-2-115(b); Section 2-4-102(a); Section 2-5-211(b); Section 2-6-102(a)(1); Section 2-6-102(b); Title 2, Chapter 6, Part 2 and Section 2-6-202(a)(3).
bill.description: As enacted, revises various election law procedures concerning registration notification forms, times for appointment of election officials, inclusion of voter's date of birth on application to vote absentee, and establishing a mechanism for non-resident property owners to vote absentee by mail. - Amends TCA Section 2-12-111(a); Section 2-2-107(a); Section 2-2-115(b); Section 2-4-102(a); Section 2-5-211(b); Section 2-6-102(a)(1); Section 2-6-102(b); Title 2, Chapter 6, Part 2 and Section 2-6-202(a)(3).
